title: Divya Polki & Ruby Nakshi Necklace: A Timeless Heirloom
materials: Faceted Rubies (approx. 5 carats). Polki diamonds are meticulously set in a Kundan setting.
features: This exquisite necklace features a stunning arrangement of Polki diamonds in geometric shapes. The rubies are set in a flower motif, adding a touch of traditional femininity. The intricate Nakshi work detailing on the reverse side showcases the masterful craftsmanship of South Indian artisans. Modern and classical aesthetic is seamlessly blended through its geometric arrangement
occasions: and special occasions like milestone birthdays and anniversaries. A striking choice for a Muhurtham or reception look.
description: This statement piece blends traditional craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The combination of Polki diamonds and rubies is considered highly auspicious in South Indian culture. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lasting luster. Polki diamonds are natural uncut diamonds which carry greater value and rarity. It can be passed down as an heirloom from generation to generation.
